name: SandboxPostCopy

methods.name: runApexClass
methods.description: Executes actions in a new sandbox to prepare it for use. For example, add logic to this method to create users, run sanitizing code on records, and perform other setup tasks.

params.name: context
params.description: The org ID, sandbox ID, and sandbox name for your sandbox. To work with these values, reference context.organizationId(), context.sandboxId(), and context.sandboxName() in your code.

description: To make your sandbox environment business ready, automate data manipulation or business logic tasks. Extend this interface and add methods to perform post-copy tasks, then specify the class during sandbox creation.
